channel.title: Anurag Mukkara on Victor A. Ying
channel.description: Recent content in Anurag Mukkara on Victor A. Ying

item.title: Timeloop: A Systematic Approach to DNN Accelerator Evaluation
item.description: An infrastructure for exploring the design space of deep neural network (DNN) accelerators, including an expressive and concise representation of hardware topologies and choices about dataflow orchestration, as well as efficient modeling of performance and energy that enables searches through large spaces of potential accelerator designs.
